verbs.description: it brexit [V: crunch] time for britain can theresa may survive it when british prime minister theresa may meets with european leaders on wednesday she will need a strong appetite as brexit turmoil threatens her government tim haughton britain university of surrey london partner international monetary fund brexit the telegraph boris johnson united kingdom researcher associate professor northern ireland deputy director europe parliament ireland labour party prime minister brussels european union theresa may owen paterson michel barnier houghton simon usherwood secretary university of birmingham
